participant_1.background:
I wash my clothes every weekend, and take the time to reflect on my life and what I want to achieve.
i take my emotions out through art.
I would love to have a pet dog but I can't because of my job.
my husband died last year.
I grew up with my family and learned to love them.

participant_2.background:
My cat was my best friend and I miss her every day.
I'm excited to try new recipes with my George Foreman grill.
i ve found other pretty good blogs to share opinions with.
I sometimes lie to my parents about where I'm going so I can hang out with my boyfriend.
I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends.

content.text: I'm doing great! Thanks for asking! How are you doing today?
I'm doing good as well! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to cook and bake. I just got a new George Foreman grill and I'm excited to try out some new recipes.
That's awesome! I love to cook too. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make chicken Parmesan. It's so easy and delicious.
Me too! I love chicken Parmesan. I also love to make pasta dishes.
Pasta is so good! I love all types of pasta.
Me too! I love spaghetti, lasagna, and ravioli.
Me too! I also love fettuccine alfredo.
That's my favorite! I love the creamy sauce.
I'm so glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
I agree! It's been nice talking to you.
You too! Have a great day!
